vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.17.16;
son of: Zichri (H2147N)
§ Amasiah = "Jehovah is strength"
son of Zichri and captain of 200,000 warriors of Judah in the reign of king Jehoshaphat of Judah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Zicrí; oficial; en tiempos del rey Josafat
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞瑪斯雅 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華是有力量的"
細基利的兒子, 猶大王約沙法時猶大廿十萬戰士的首領. #代下 17:16|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚玛斯雅 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华是有力量的"
细基利的儿子, 犹大王约沙法时犹大廿十万战士的首领. #代下 17:16|
